014package de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.junit5;
015
016import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull;
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
018
019import de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded.DatabaseInfo;
020import de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded.DatabaseManager;
021import de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded.DatabaseManager.DatabaseManagerBuilder;
022import de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded.EmbeddedPostgres;
023
024import java.lang.reflect.Type;
025import java.sql.SQLException;
026import java.util.UUID;
027import javax.sql.DataSource;
028
029import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
030import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterAllCallback;
031import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterEachCallback;
032import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeAllCallback;
033import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeEachCallback;
034import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
035import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext.Namespace;
036import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext.Store;
037import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterContext;
038import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolutionException;
039import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolver;
040import org.slf4j.Logger;
041import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
042
043/**
044 * A <a href="https://junit.org/junit5/docs/current/user-guide/#extensions">JUnit 5 extension</a> that manages an embedded PostgreSQL database server.
045 * <p>
046 * This extension can provide the {@link EmbeddedPostgres} instance, a {@link DatabaseInfo} or a {@link DataSource} object as test parameters.
047 *
048 * <ul>
049 * <li>Using a {@link DatabaseInfo} parameter is equivalent to calling {@link #createDatabaseInfo()}.</li>
050 * <li>Using a {@link DataSource} parameter is equivalent to calling {@link #createDataSource()}.</li>
051 * </ul>
052 */
053public final class EmbeddedPgExtension implements BeforeAllCallback, AfterAllCallback, BeforeEachCallback, AfterEachCallback, ParameterResolver {
054
055    private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(EmbeddedPgExtension.class);
056
057    // multiple instances must use different namespaces
058    private final Namespace PG_NAMESPACE = Namespace.create(UUID.randomUUID());
059
060    private final DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager> databaseManagerBuilder;
061
062    private volatile DatabaseManager databaseManager = null;
063
064    private EmbeddedPgExtension(DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager> databaseManagerBuilder) {
065        this.databaseManagerBuilder = databaseManagerBuilder;
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Creates a new {@link EmbeddedPgExtensionBuilder} that allows further customization of the {@link EmbeddedPgExtension}. The resulting extension manages the
070     * database server in multi-mode (creating multiple databases).
071     *
072     * @return A {@link EmbeddedPgExtensionBuilder} instance. Never null.
073     */
074    public static EmbeddedPgExtensionBuilder multiDatabase() {
075        return new EmbeddedPgExtensionBuilder(true);
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * Creates a new {@link EmbeddedPgExtensionBuilder} that allows further customization of the {@link EmbeddedPgExtension}. The resulting extension manages the
080     * database server in single-mode (using a single database instance).
081     *
082     * @return A {@link EmbeddedPgExtensionBuilder} instance. Never null.
083     */
084    public static EmbeddedPgExtensionBuilder singleDatabase() {
085        return new EmbeddedPgExtensionBuilder(false);
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * Default constructor which allows using this extension with the {@link org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtendWith} annotation.
090     * <p>
091     * This is equivalent to using <pre>{@code
092     *     @RegisterExtension
093     *     public static EmbeddedPgExtension pg = MultiDatabaseBuilder.instanceWithDefaults().build();
094     *     }</pre>
095     */
096    public EmbeddedPgExtension() {
097        this(new DatabaseManagerBuilder(true).withInstancePreparer(EmbeddedPostgres.Builder::withDefaults));
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Returns a data source. Depending on the mode it returns a datasource connected to the same database (single mode) or a new database (multi mode) on every
102     * call.
103     *
104     * @return A {@link DataSource} instance. This is never null.
105     * @throws SQLException If a problem connecting to the database occurs.
106     */
107    public DataSource createDataSource() throws SQLException {
108        return createDatabaseInfo().asDataSource();
109    }
110
111    @VisibleForTesting
112    EmbeddedPostgres getEmbeddedPostgres() {
113        return databaseManager.getEmbeddedPostgres();
114    }
115
116    /**
117     * Returns a new {@link DatabaseInfo} describing a database connection.
118     * <p>
119     * Depending on the mode, this either describes the same database (single mode) or a new database (multi mode).
120     *
121     * @return A {@link DatabaseInfo} instance. This is never null.
122     * @throws SQLException If a problem connecting to the database occurs.
123     */
124    public DatabaseInfo createDatabaseInfo() throws SQLException {
125        checkState(databaseManager != null, "no before method has been called!");
126
127        DatabaseInfo databaseInfo = databaseManager.getDatabaseInfo();
128        LOG.info("Connection to {}", databaseInfo.asJdbcUrl());
129        return databaseInfo;
130    }
131
132    @Override
133    public void beforeAll(ExtensionContext extensionContext) throws Exception {
134        checkNotNull(extensionContext, "extensionContext is null");
135
136        Store pgStore = extensionContext.getStore(PG_NAMESPACE);
137
138        TestMode testMode = pgStore.getOrComputeIfAbsent(TestMode.TESTMODE_KEY,
139                k -> new TestMode(extensionContext.getUniqueId(), databaseManagerBuilder.build()),
140                TestMode.class);
141
142        this.databaseManager = testMode.start(extensionContext.getUniqueId());
143    }
144
145    @Override
146    public void afterAll(ExtensionContext extensionContext) throws Exception {
147        checkNotNull(extensionContext, "extensionContext is null");
148
149        Store pgStore = extensionContext.getStore(PG_NAMESPACE);
150        TestMode testMode = pgStore.get(TestMode.TESTMODE_KEY, TestMode.class);
151
152        if (testMode != null) {
153            this.databaseManager = testMode.stop(extensionContext.getUniqueId());
154        }
155    }
156
157    @Override
158    public void beforeEach(ExtensionContext extensionContext) throws Exception {
159        checkNotNull(extensionContext, "extensionContext is null");
160
161        Store pgStore = extensionContext.getStore(PG_NAMESPACE);
162        TestMode testMode = pgStore.getOrComputeIfAbsent(TestMode.TESTMODE_KEY,
163                k -> new TestMode(extensionContext.getUniqueId(), databaseManagerBuilder.build()),
164                TestMode.class);
165
166        this.databaseManager = testMode.start(extensionContext.getUniqueId());
167    }
168
169    @Override
170    public void afterEach(ExtensionContext extensionContext) throws Exception {
171        checkNotNull(extensionContext, "extensionContext is null");
172
173        Store pgStore = extensionContext.getStore(PG_NAMESPACE);
174        TestMode testMode = pgStore.get(TestMode.TESTMODE_KEY, TestMode.class);
175
176        if (testMode != null) {
177            this.databaseManager = testMode.stop(extensionContext.getUniqueId());
178        }
179    }
180
181    @Override
182    public boolean supportsParameter(ParameterContext parameterContext, ExtensionContext extensionContext) {
183        Type type = parameterContext.getParameter().getType();
184        return type == EmbeddedPostgres.class
185                || type == DatabaseInfo.class
186                || type == DataSource.class;
187    }
188
189    @Override
190    public Object resolveParameter(ParameterContext parameterContext, ExtensionContext extensionContext) {
191        Type type = parameterContext.getParameter().getType();
192        try {
193            if (type == EmbeddedPostgres.class) {
194                return getEmbeddedPostgres();
195            } else if (type == DatabaseInfo.class) {
196                return createDatabaseInfo();
197
198            } else if (type == DataSource.class) {
199                return createDataSource();
200            }
201        } catch (SQLException e) {
202            throw new ParameterResolutionException("Could not create " + type.getTypeName() + " instance", e);
203        }
204        return null;
205    }
206
207    /**
208     * Builder for {@link EmbeddedPgExtension} customization.
209     */
210    public static final class EmbeddedPgExtensionBuilder extends DatabaseManager.Builder<EmbeddedPgExtension> {
211
212        private EmbeddedPgExtensionBuilder(boolean multiMode) {
213            super(multiMode);
214        }
215
216        /**
217         * Create a {@link EmbeddedPgExtension} instance.
218         *
219         * @return A {@link EmbeddedPgExtension} instance. Is never null.
220         */
221        @Override
222        public EmbeddedPgExtension build() {
223            DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager> databaseManagerBuilder = new DatabaseManagerBuilder(multiMode)
224                    .withDataSourcePreparers(dataSourcePreparers.build());
225
226            instancePreparers.build().forEach(databaseManagerBuilder::withInstancePreparer);
227            return new EmbeddedPgExtension(databaseManagerBuilder);
228        }
229    }
230
231    private static final class TestMode {
232
233        private static final Object TESTMODE_KEY = new Object();
234
235        private final String id;
236        private final DatabaseManager databaseManager;
237
238        private TestMode(String id, DatabaseManager databaseManager) {
239            this.id = id;
240            this.databaseManager = databaseManager;
241        }
242
243        private DatabaseManager start(String id) throws Exception {
244            if (this.id.equals(id)) {
245                databaseManager.start();
246            }
247
248            return databaseManager;
249        }
250
251        private DatabaseManager stop(String id) throws Exception {
252            if (this.id.equals(id)) {
253                databaseManager.close();
254                return null;
255            }
256
257            return databaseManager;
258        }
259    }
260}
